title: If you're feeling lonely (and what God has to say about it)
description:
Scripture lays out a roadmap for us. We were built for connection. Join me today in this special sneak peek from my NEW Find Your People Bible study coming 2/22.

Find the study here: https://www.amazon.com/Find-Your-People-Building-Community/dp/0593193385

Thanks HelloFresh! Go to HelloFresh dot com slash madeforthis16 and use code madeforthis16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts!
